LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Hand.label: Smelt steel alloy
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Hand.description: Smelts steel alloy from iron ore and coal or charcoal. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Electric.label: Smelt steel alloy
LanguageData.MakeSteelBars_Electric.description: Smelts steel alloy from iron ore and coal or charcoal. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Hand.label: Smelt bronze alloy
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Hand.description: Smelts bronze alloy from copper ore and other metals. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Electric.label: Smelt bronze alloy
LanguageData.MakeBronze_Electric.description: Smelts bronze alloy from copper ore and other metals. Produces 30.
LanguageData.ProcessNickelOre.label: Smelt nickel alloy
LanguageData.ProcessNickelOre.description: Smelts nickel alloy from nickel ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessCobalt.label: Smelt cobalt alloy
LanguageData.ProcessCobalt.description: Smelts cobalt alloy from nickel ore. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessForChromium.label: Smelt chromium alloy
LanguageData.ProcessForChromium.description: Smelts chromium alloy from iron ore. Chromium is a vital ingredient used in the production of nichrome. Produces 10.
LanguageData.ProcessTungsten.label: Smelt tungsten alloy
LanguageData.ProcessTungsten.description: Smelts wolframite ore into tungsten alloy. Produces 15.
LanguageData.ProcessTitanium.label: Smelt titanium alloy
LanguageData.ProcessTitanium.description: Smelts ilmenite ore into titanium alloy. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCupronickelAlloy.label: Smelt melchior alloy
LanguageData.MakeCupronickelAlloy.description: Smelts melchior alloy from copper, nickel and aluminum. Melchior has a high electrical resistance. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeFerrosiliconAlloy.label: Smelt sendust alloy
LanguageData.MakeFerrosiliconAlloy.description: Smelts sendust alloy by reducing silicon in the presence of iron and aluminium. Sendust is a tougher metal than steel. Produces 30.
LanguageData.MakeFerronickelAlloy.label: Smelt stein alloy
LanguageData.MakeFerronickelAlloy.description: Smelts stein alloy from iron, nickel. Stein is a tougher metal than sendust. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeStelliteAlloy.label: Smelt stellite alloy
LanguageData.MakeStelliteAlloy.description: Smelts stellite, an alloy of cobalt, chromium and tungsten. Stellite is designed for wear resistance. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeAlnicoAlloy.label: Smelt alnico alloy
LanguageData.MakeAlnicoAlloy.description: Smelts alnico, an alloy of steel, nickel, aluminum and cobalt. Alnico is used in the creation of strong permanent magnets, and can be magnetised to produce strong magnetic fields. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakePobediteAlloy.label: Smelt pobedite alloy
LanguageData.MakePobediteAlloy.description: Smelts pobedite, an alloy of carbon fiber, tungsten and cobalt. This composite alloy possesses a particularly high hardness. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Hand.label: Smelt gold alloy
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Hand.description: Smelts gold, a beautiful, precious alloy of gold and copper or bauxite. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Electric.label: Smelt gold alloy
LanguageData.MakeGoldBars_Electric.description: Smelts gold, a beautiful, precious alloy of gold and copper or bauxite. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Hand.label: Smelt sterling silver alloy
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Hand.description: Smelts sterling silver, a valuable alloy of silver and either copper or bauxite. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Electric.label: Smelt sterling silver alloy
LanguageData.MakeSilverBars_Electric.description: Smelts sterling silver, a valuable alloy of silver and either copper or bauxite. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Hand.label: Smelt copper alloy
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Hand.description: Smelts copper alloy from copper ore. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Electric.label: Smelt copper alloy
LanguageData.MakeCopperBars_Electric.description: Smelts copper alloy from copper ore. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Hand.label: Smelt tin alloy
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Hand.description: Smelts tin alloy from tin ore. Tin can be used to construct workbenches with higher than average working speed. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Electric.label: Smelt tin alloy
LanguageData.MakeTinBars_Electric.description: Smelts tin alloy from tin ore. Tin can be used to construct workbenches with higher than average working speed. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Electric.label: Smelt aluminium alloy
LanguageData.MakeAluminiumBars_Electric.description: Smelts aluminium alloy from bauxite ore. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeLeadBars_Hand.label: Smelt lead alloy
LanguageData.MakeLeadBars_Hand.description: Smelts lead alloy from anglesite ore. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeLeadBars_Electric.label: Smelt lead alloy
LanguageData.MakeLeadBars_Electric.description: Smelts lead alloy from anglesite ore. Produces 20.
LanguageData.MakeFerrotitaniumAlloy.label: Smelt ferrotitanium alloy
LanguageData.MakeFerrotitaniumAlloy.description: Smelts ferrotitanium, a very durable alloy made from steel, titanium and carbon fiber. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeNitinolAlloy.label: Smelt nitinol alloy
LanguageData.MakeNitinolAlloy.description: Smelts nitinol, an alloy of nickel and titanium. It is exceptionally durable, somewhat beautiful and difficult to make. Produces 15.
LanguageData.MakeCarbonAlloy.label: Smelt carbon fiber alloy
LanguageData.MakeCarbonAlloy.description: Smelts carbon fiber alloy, a polymer composite material of interwoven strands of carbon fibers arranged in a matrix of polymer resins. Produces 10.
LanguageData.MakeDepletedUraniumAlloy.label: Depleted uranium alloy
LanguageData.MakeDepletedUraniumAlloy.description: Smelts depleted uranium alloy from uranium. Produces 10.
